message.entry: Method must be called using 'parallel.gpu.GPUDevice.{0}'.
Failed to load library ''{0}''. The error was:\n{1}\n
无法加载图形驱动。无法加载库 ''{0}''。错误是:\n{1}\n请更新或重新安装您的图形驱动。
Device count mode must be "all", "available", or "supported".
以后的 MATLAB 版本将不再支持具有计算能力 {0,number,integer}.{1,number,integer} 的 GPU 设备。有关 GPU 支持的详细信息，请参阅 GPU 计算要求。
Execution on the GPU was interrupted. To continue, reset the GPU using 'gpuDevice({0,number,integer})', or restart MATLAB.
将重新编译 GPU 库，因为 CUDA_FORCE_PTX_JIT 设置为 ''1''。编译可能需要几分钟时间。
将重新编译 GPU 库，因为 CUDA_FORCE_PTX_JIT 设置为 ''1''。编译可能需要几分钟时间。了解详细信息。
将重新编译 GPU 库，因为您的设备比库更新。编译可能需要几分钟时间。
将重新编译 GPU 库，因为您的设备比库更新。编译可能需要几分钟时间。了解详细信息。
Encountered an internal error on the selected GPU device. To continue, reset the GPU using 'gpuDevice({0,number,integer})', or restart MATLAB.
Property can only be set for the selected GPU device. To set the property, first select the GPU using 'gpuDevice({0,number,integer})'.
加载的 CUDADevice 对象未指示此计算机上 CUDA 设备的属性。使用 gpuDevice 函数访问此计算机上的 CUDA 设备。了解详细信息。

GPU device is not supported because it has a higher compute capability ({0,number,integer}.{1,number,integer}) than is natively supported by the CUDA libraries. Use parallel.gpu.enableCUDAForwardCompatibility(true) to enable forward compatibility for GPU devices. If you enable forward compatibility, you might see unexpected behavior in GPU computations.
GPU 设备不受支持，因为其计算能力太低。设备的计算能力为 {0,number,integer}.{1,number,integer}，但最低要求是 {2,number,integer}.{3,number,integer}。
无法为计算初始化图形驱动。CUDA 错误为: {0}
Failed to load graphics driver. Unable to load library ''{0}''.
Unable to load all CUDA functions from graphics driver. Update or reinstall your graphics driver.
There is a problem with the graphics driver or with this GPU device.
Could not extract version information from ''{0}''.
Could not find graphics driver named ''{0}''.
Could not read version information from ''{0}''.
Could not calculate driver version for computer type {0}.
Could not read version information from ''{0}''.
Unable to use graphics driver because ''cuDriverGetVersion'' failed. The error was:\n{0}\nUpdate or reinstall your graphics driver.
Execution on the GPU was interrupted. To continue using this GPU device, restart MATLAB.
Unable to connect to the network. Check your internet connection.
MATLAB installation is corrupted. If this problem persists, contact MathWorks Technical Support.
Installer credentials are not valid. If this problem persists, contact MathWorks Technical Support.
Unable to create install destination. Check folder permissions for ''{0}''.
The specified MATLAB release is unavailable. If this problem persists, contact MathWorks Technical Support.
Installation of the Parallel Computing Toolbox GPU libraries failed. If this problem persists, contact MathWorks Technical Support.
Installation of the Parallel Computing Toolbox GPU libraries failed. The error was: \n{0}
将下载并安装 Parallel Computing Toolbox GPU 库(大小为若干 GB)，因为它们在您的系统中不存在。此过程可能需要几分钟。

Failed to load Parallel Computing Toolbox GPU libraries. GPU functionality might not be enabled on your system. To check whether the GPU libraries are installed on your local machine, call gpuDevice. Installing the GPU libraries on parallel workers is not supported.
Encountered error when retrieving CUDA device properties. The CUDA error was:\n{0}
Invalid cache policy. Valid options are "maximum", "balanced", "minimum" or [].
CUDA 设备 ID {0} 无效。请从范围 1:{1} 中选择设备 ID。
索引必须为正整数。
Invalid value for the lazy evaluation cap.
Lazy evaluation policy ''{0}'' was not recognized.
macOS 不支持使用 Parallel Computing Toolbox 的 GPU 加速。
将来的 MATLAB 版本不再支持在 macOS 上使用 Parallel Computing Toolbox 的 GPU 加速。
GPU acceleration with Parallel Computing Toolbox is not supported on macOS versions 10.14 (Mojave) and above. Support for earlier macOS versions will be removed in a future MATLAB release.
New value must be true (1) or false (0).
找不到支持的 GPU 设备。
Unable to load graphics driver.
Selected GPU device is in an invalid state. Try reselecting the device using the gpuDevice function.
图形驱动已过期。请从 NVIDIA 下载并安装适用于您的 GPU 的最新图形驱动。
GPU acceleration with Parallel Computing Toolbox is not supported on this platform.
Unable to reset CUDADevice because it is not selected. To select a CUDADevice use the gpuDevice function.
GPU 设备 {0} 被多个线程工作进程选择。其他线程工作进程上的 gpuArray 和 CUDAKernel 数据不会清除。要清除所有线程工作进程的所有 GPU 内存，请使用 parfevalOnAll(@gpuDevice,0,[]) 为所有工作进程取消选择此设备。
CUDA runtime failed to initialize correctly. This can occur with some older graphics drivers.
参数必须为正整数或 []。
Argument must be a positive integer.
Failed to use GPU device {0}. Device is busy or unavailable.
Selected GPU device is not supported.
显示所有属性。
Unable to find an available GPU device. All supported devices are in exclusive use or in prohibited compute mode.
CUDA 执行期间遇到意外错误。CUDA 错误为:\n{0}

Unable to use graphics driver because ''cuDriverGetVersion'' was not found. This can occur with old versions of the graphics drivers. The library name used was ''{0}''. Update or reinstall your graphics driver.
Worker {0} failed to use GPU device {1}. Device is already in use.
